general.name: Grass Starter
general.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

general.name: Sugar
general.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

general.name: Wheat Flour
general.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

general.name: Rice
general.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

general.name: Oil
general.description: All purpose cooking oil.

general.name: Vinegar
general.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

general.name: Basic Fertilizer
general.description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Quality Fertilizer
general.description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Basic Retaining Soil
general.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Quality Retaining Soil
general.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Speed-Gro
general.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Deluxe Speed-Gro
general.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.

general.name: Cherry Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Apricot Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Orange Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Peach Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Pomegranate Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Apple Sapling
general.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

general.name: Catalogue
general.description: Provides unlimited access to all wallpapers and floors... from the convenience of your home!

general.name: Bouquet
general.description: A gift that shows your romantic interest.
